title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the flashy Chiefs offense and why their success with Patrick Mahomes and Andy Reid is good for the NFL. He admits he might have made a major mistake by picking the Broncos to be an AFC contender after acquiring Russell Wilson. He tells you why he was right about Aaron Rodgers and wrong about the Steelers. Plus, Hall of Famer Jimmy Johnson joins the show to talk about the Cowboys winning their 3rd straight game with back up QB Cooper Rush. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
